profileAlternative.name: Priyanka Prakash
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer 2 at Microsoft
profileAlternative.summary:
Graduated from University of Southern California with Master's in Computer Science.

Working as a Software Engineer at Intel Corporation.

Mentor, Outreachy for Node.js and a Student Scholarship Reviewer on the Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing (GHC 17)

Worked as a Research Student at University of Southern California under Professor Cyrus Shahabi on a project iHealth, for clinical evaluation of patients with musculo- skeletal disorders using a 3D sensor(Microsoft Kinect).

Worked as a Software Engineer at SAP Labs India Pvt. Ltd. where I worked as an Android Developer for SAP Mobile Applications Team.

Areas of Interest: Software Development, Mobile Applications, Operating Systems, Software Engineering

aboutAlternative.text:
Graduated from University of Southern California with Master's in Computer Science.

Working as a Software Engineer at Intel Corporation.

Mentor, Outreachy for Node.js and a Student Scholarship Reviewer on the Grace Hopper Celebration of Women in Computing (GHC 17)

Worked as a Research Student at University of Southern California under Professor Cyrus Shahabi on a project iHealth, for clinical evaluation of patients with musculo- skeletal disorders using a 3D sensor(Microsoft Kinect).

Worked as a Software Engineer at SAP Labs India Pvt. Ltd. where I worked as an Android Developer for SAP Mobile Applications Team.

Areas of Interest: Software Development, Mobile Applications, Operating Systems, Software Engineering

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Worked on an open source project called NODEDC, contributing directly to core open source software to enable it to run in an optimal manner on Intel's processors for current and future cloud and datacenter systems. Served as one of the main developers for an open source workload, Node-DC-EIS, representing realistic usages of Node.js in the data center ...

positions.title: SSG-Intern
positions.description: Worked as an intern at Intel in the System Technology Optimization team on a project based on Hip Hop Virtual Machine. Developed a tool in Ruby to process and summarize critical details on metrics that are needed for in-depth characterization across many architectures.

positions.title: Developer Associate
positions.description:
 Experience in Mobile software applications development.

 Worked with the “Android Development Team” on the project “SAP Retail Execution” - a mobile application for Android smartphones and tablets designed for sales represe...

educations.title: B. M. S. College of Engineering

items: Spatial Database Application for USC Transportation
Zillow Property Search Android Application with Facebook and AWS Integration
Multithreading – Token Bucket Emulation in C
Apache-Solr based Search Engine and Ranking Algorithms for NSF and NASA Polar Datasets
Association Rule Mining with Cloud Integration- A Comparative Study

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Software Engineer in Test| NetApp Solidfire
Software Development Engineer at Yahoo! Inc.

volunteerExperience.title: Volunteer
volunteerExperience.experience: Month of Service at SAP in association with Agastya international Foundation
